content: This article includes a list of references, related reading, or external links, **but its sources remain unclear because it lacks inline citations**. Please help improve this article by introducing more precise citations. *(November 2012)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Kreta Ayer Single Member Constituency** was a constituency spanning [Chinatown](/wiki/Chinatown,_Singapore) and [Raffles Place](/wiki/Raffles_Place) in Singapore. It used to exist from 1959 to 1988 as **Kreta Ayer Constituency** and was renamed as **Kreta Ayer Single Member Constituency** (SMC) as part of Singapore's political reforms. The SMC was merged into [Kreta Ayer–Tanglin Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Kreta_Ayer%E2%80%93Tanglin_Group_Representation_Constituency) in 1997. ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)**1959**[Goh Keng Swee](/wiki/Goh_Keng_Swee)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1968**Goh Keng Swee[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1972****1976****1980****1984**[Richard Hu](/wiki/Richard_Hu)**1988****1991** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1959](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election): Kreta Ayer PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Goh Keng Swee](/wiki/Goh_Keng_Swee)9,31373.35[LSP](/wiki/Liberal_Socialist_Party)Pang Man Ming3,38426.65[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)5,92946.7[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)12,99591.69[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics)) - 1959 GE's result - 1963 GE's result - 1968 GE's result - 1972 GE's result - 1976 GE's result - 1980 GE's result - 1984 GE's result - 1988 GE's result - 1991 GE's result
title: Kreta Ayer Single Member Constituency
